description:
A Gundam type provided to the http://anidb.net/ch131851 [Dawn of Fold], an anti-Spacian organization active on Earth. Like its sibling, the http://anidb.net/ch128538 [Lfrith Ur], it is a drastically updated machine based on the http://anidb.net/ch125029 [Gundam Lfrith Pre-Production Model].
Source: Official page
name: EDM-GA-02 Gundam Lfrith Thorn
